snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include musings about small children and mobile devices, a one-hand zoom on Google Maps and April Fools’ Day in the...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include musings about small children and mobile devices, a one-hand zoom on Google Maps and April Fools’ Day in the technology community.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Digital Music Resales, and an Obsolete Supercomputer
